snippet.title: MD Ayrton Senna's Super Monaco GP II
snippet.description: The Megadrive, Master System and Game Gear exclusive sequel to Super Monaco GP brought onboard Ayrton Senna, then F1 world champion to advise on the game production. It's refined in every aspect when compared to the original with all new modes such as Senna's GP which you will see me (poorly) playing on this video. A worthy sequel and definitely a game worth having on your Megadrive cart library. After Senna's fatal accident en 1994 I stopped following Formula 1. R.I.P. Champion.
